title: Yuzu spicy red ramen (3 servings)
content:
Spicy level 4 (0-8)
AFURI proposes a new concept of "Tasty, spicy and sour." Karakurenai's signature product is now available as Kake Ramen.
AFURI's proud chicken clear broth is seasoned with a richly flavored white soy sauce, and various types of chili powder, fresh chili puree, and aromatic chili oil are used to create a deep spiciness with different characteristics. Freshly squeezed yuzu juice from Kochi Prefecture is used to add a sour taste to the "Tasty Spicy Sour" dish.
The noodles are the same as in the actual store . "Extra thin noodles with Japanese pepper" " "With Japanese pepper" You can choose from two types: "vacuum hand-kneaded noodles" and "noodles with a simmered sauce." Extra-thin noodles with "sansho pepper": These noodles are made from wheat flour, which has a strong elasticity and stickiness and is resistant to stretching when boiled, and are cut into extra-thin noodles using No. 24 threads, with the addition of Japanese pepper and Japanese sansho pepper. You can enjoy the refreshing aroma and tingling sensation of the sansho pepper as you slurp.

"With Japanese pepper" Vacuum hand-kneaded noodles: Two types of domestic wheat with different characteristics are mixed with durum flour and kneaded in a vacuum mixer. The special noodles are hand-kneaded with added Hana Sansho pepper and Japanese Sansho pepper, and are characterized by their refreshing tangy flavor and smooth, chewy texture.
The spiciness level is about level 4 on a scale of 0 to 8. If you add the extra spicy chili oil that comes with the dish, you can adjust the spiciness to about level 5 or 6.
*The image is for illustrative purposes only. (The product does not include boiled eggs or vegetables.)

→ Added " Spicy Adjustment Kit (with bonus) " sold separately!!
▼Contents ・Homemade Sansho Thin Noodles (approx. 130g) x 3 or Homemade Sansho Vacuum Hand-Mixed Noodles (approx. 155g) x 3 ・Spicy Red Chicken and Seafood Soup (approx. 360cc) x 3 servings ・Spicy Red Powder (15g) x 1 bag ・Freshly Squeezed Yuzu Juice (15cc) x 3 bottles from Kochi Prefecture ・Super Spicy Chili Oil (15cc) x 1 bottle

▼How to eat (delicious recipe included) (Preparation) Fill a bowl with boiling water to warm it up. Thaw the yuzu juice in advance under running water or in the refrigerator, then float it in the water to warm it up. 1. Boil plenty of water in a pot and heat the soup pack for about 10 minutes. 2 Bring a large amount of water to a boil in another pot and add the noodles. Once the noodles have loosened up naturally, spread them out with chopsticks and continue boiling over high heat for 1 to 1.5 minutes (2.5 to 3 minutes for vacuum-kneaded noodles with sansho pepper) until they are cooked to your desired firmness. 3. Discard the water from the heated bowl and add 1 tablespoon (approximately 6g) of spicy red powder. Then pour in the soup heated in step 1 and mix. Next, drain the boiled noodles thoroughly using a strainer with a handle and add them to the bowl. 4. After arranging the noodles with chopsticks, shake well and pour in one bottle (15cc) of warmed yuzu juice. Finally, add spicy chili oil to taste and it's done.

title: Mori Tsukemen (3 servings)
content:
This soup stock is made using an abundance of carefully selected ingredients, such as fresh chicken bones, aromatic vegetables, kelp, dried sardines, and dried fish (bonito flakes, dried round mullet flakes, dried mackerel flakes, etc.), and is carefully made over a long period of time and effort to condense the flavor. The dipping sauce is an original AFURI flavor, made with three types of sharp soy sauce, fish sauce, black vinegar, flavored oil, etc. to create a rich and appetizing flavor. The AFURI style is to have it cold (both the noodles and the dipping sauce are cold).
The noodles are made from two different types of domestic wheat with different characteristics, as well as nutritious whole wheat flour. They are kneaded in a vacuum mixer and then kneaded by hand, making them the same "vacuum hand-kneaded noodles" that are served in stores.

A special assortment of AFURI's most beloved souvenir ramen. This set includes three signature flavors – refreshing Yuzu Shio, savory Yuzu Shoyu, and spicy Yuzu Ratanmen – so you can enjoy the authentic taste of AFURI at home.
Yuzu Shio Ramen AFURI's iconic dish. A clear chicken and seafood-based broth enhanced with the bright aroma of Japanese yuzu. Light yet deeply flavorful – the true signature of AFURI.
Yuzu Shoyu Ramen A harmonious blend of mellow soy sauce and the fresh fragrance of yuzu. Each sip reveals layers of umami and depth.
Yuzu Ratanmen A bold and addictive bowl combining the spiciness of doubanjiang and red chili with AFURI's signature citrusy yuzu aroma and tang.
Noodles Thin, firm noodles made with two types of whole wheat flour for excellent bite and resistance to overcooking. Specially crafted after numerous trials to deliver AFURI's one-of-a-kind texture.
Soup No artificial seasonings. Only carefully selected ingredients such as chicken bones, aromatic vegetables, kelp, and dried fish are used to create a soup rich in natural umami.
Toppings Finely cut domestic yuzu peel – one of AFURI's defining ingredients – adds a fragrant and refreshing finishing touch.

title: Ramen soup (soy sauce)
content:
"Shoyu Kake Ramen" features a trinity of layers of the aroma of chicken, seafood, and soy sauce. The base soup is a clear chicken broth, like the Yuzu Shio Ramen, made with fresh ingredients, brewed water, and carefully skimmed off the scum. The soy sauce sauce, which they are proud of, is a combination of rich, flavorful tamari, luxurious re-brewed soy sauce, fragrant raw soy sauce, and fish sauce, finished with a subtle hint of ginger. It can also be used as additional soup for various AFURI hot pot products! \You can also enjoy recipe variations!/ You can also enjoy it as rice porridge by pouring rice and beaten eggs into the soup and simmering it in a pot. Serve with spring onions or chicken char siu, if desired. Please use it for various other recipes. We look forward to your recommended recipes in the reviews!!
*The image is for illustrative purposes only. Noodles and toppings are not included.
Contents: Chicken and seafood soup (approx. 360cc) x 1 serving

title: AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings)
content:
AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings per box)
Click here for English explanation (Jump to English Description)
Addictive Yuzu and spicy flavor "Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles" Our staff's most popular dish! Now you can enjoy our Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles, which were previously only available in-store, at home. The fragrant yuzu and spicy red chili peppers combine to create a soup that will have you hooked at first bite!
A supreme bowl of ramen secretly recommended by AFURI staff The AFURI menu item "Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles" is actually very popular among the staff. The refreshing aroma of yuzu and the spiciness of chili peppers are a perfect match. Take a bite of the richly flavored soup and you'll discover a new taste. A special ramen only available at AFURI, loved by customers from overseas and savored to the last drop.
【noodles】 These extra-thin noodles are made from wheat flour, which has a strong elasticity and stickiness and is resistant to stretching when boiled, and two types of whole wheat flour with different particle sizes. These special dried noodles were created after numerous trials and have a unique blend that cannot be replicated anywhere else.
【soup】 - The aroma and stimulating flavor of this bean paste based dish will whet your appetite, and the addition of red chili peppers will give it a vibrant kick that will fill your mouth. The strong spiciness and rich flavor are so delicious that you'll be hooked once you try it.
-Multi-layered umami flavor of seafood stockBy exquisitely combining mackerel flakes, bonito flakes, grilled flying fish, kelp, etc., we have achieved a multi-layered and deep umami flavor.
The aroma and sourness of yuzu fills your mouth. The sourness of the yuzu juice gently envelops the spiciness, making this a cup that will have you reaching for the spoon.
[Seasonings] Made with finely cut domestic yuzu peel. Yuzu is one of the most important ingredients, so much so that it is said that "AFURI is synonymous with yuzu." We also paid particular attention to the grain size and the amount per cup.

Yuzu × Spicy Chili – An Addictive Harmony Once available only in our restaurants, AFURI's beloved Yuzu Ratanmen can now be enjoyed at home. A perfect balance of refreshing Japanese yuzu and the bold heat of red chili creates a soup that captivates from the very first sip. title: Afuri IPA 350ml (6-bottle set) [Cannot be bundled]
content:
AFURI BREWING/Afuri IPA
Experience the fruity aroma! AFURI's first craft beer
A juicy and gorgeous fragrance reminiscent of mango, passion fruit, and grapefruit spreads. Afuri IPA is a hazy IPA style beer characterized by its mellow mouthfeel and light aftertaste. The DDH (double dry hop) method uses a generous amount of hops, so the aroma spreads softly just by bringing the glass close, making it easy to drink even for those new to craft beer.

Our thoughts

AFURI BREWING began with a pure and passionate desire to make beer. At the heart of this is the "craftsmanship" that has been passed down to AFURI Ramen. We are committed to handcrafting, honing individuality and pursuing the finest aromas and flavors. We also tried our hand at creating a hazy IPA style, with the desire to create a memorable aroma. Then, in Gora, Hakone, we designed the recipe from scratch and brewed it together with a trusted brewer. AFURI's first original craft beer. This is a memorable first step towards realizing our dream of brewing our own beer.
◼︎Product overview Product name: Afuri IPA Style: DDH HAZY IPA Alcohol content: 6.5% IBUs ( International Bitterness Units ): 12.5 Capacity: 350ml can / set of 6 Ingredients: Malt (imported), hops Production location: GORA BREWERY (Hakone, Kanagawa Prefecture) Storage method: Keep refrigerated. Best before date: Printed on the bottom of the can.
Other : It usually takes 2-3 days from order to shipping.・This item will be sent by Yamato Transport (refrigerated).
◼︎Regarding returns/exchanges If there is any problem with the product, we will deal with it immediately. Please contact us by email or phone within 2 days of receiving the product. Please note that even if you wish to exchange an item, we may not be able to accommodate your request depending on stock availability. In that case, we apologize for the inconvenience, but we will cancel your order (and refund your money).
*Shipping fee: 1,300 yen
*You must be 20 years old to drink alcohol. Please refrain from drinking alcohol during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. *Prices include tax (10%).

title: Ramen soup (spicy red)
content:
Karakurenai's signature product is now available as a standalone soup.
AFURI's proud clear chicken broth is seasoned with a richly flavored white soy sauce, and the dish is enhanced with different types of chili powder, fresh chili puree, and aromatic chili oil, all of which combine to create a deep, spicy flavor. It can also be used as an additional soup for various AFURI hot pot products!
The spiciness of the soup with the included spicy red powder is about level 4 on the restaurant's level scale (0-8). If you add the extra spicy chili oil that comes with it, you can adjust the spiciness to about level 5-6.
[Recommended] Add yuzu for a delicious, spicy and sour taste! Add freshly squeezed yuzu juice from Kochi Prefecture (sold separately) to enjoy a delicious, spicy, and sour taste! (Approximately 15cc per 1 piece.)
\Enjoy recipe variations too!/ You can also enjoy it as rice porridge by pouring rice and beaten eggs into the soup and simmering it in a pot. Serve with green onions or chicken char siu, if desired. Please use it for various other recipe variations. We look forward to your recommended recipes in the reviews!!
*The image is for illustrative purposes only. Noodles and toppings (roasted pork, yuzu juice, etc.) are not included.

title: Ramen Tebo with AFURI original logo
content:
Introducing a super item that will instantly raise the quality of your ramen at home!
This is Tebo, a familiar name at ramen restaurants. It has a cute mountain logo on the front. On the back, it is an original product with the AFURI letters hardened in. Each one has a different grain, color, and texture, so each one has a different look.
Why not try draining water at home in a cool way using this original drainer?
As a professional item, it will of course make everything from boiling the noodles, draining the water, plating them, and eating them a breeze! Not only can it be used for ramen, but also for soba, udon, and pasta. You can also boil broccoli and edamame, or wash vegetables in the basket and drain them in the basket. It's surprisingly versatile.

title: YUZU HAZY IPA 370ml(6本セット)[同梱不可品]
content:
AFURI BREWING/YUZU HAZY IPA
AFURIクラフトビール第二弾。和の香りが織りなす、唯一無二のHAZY IPA
マンゴーやパッションフルーツを思わせる華やかなアロマに、爽やかな柚子の香りがふわりと重なります。王道のHAZY IPAスタイルに、AFURIらしい“和のエッセンス”を融合。苦味やアルコール感を抑えつつ、前回よりも少しボディ感を持たせ、柚子の酸味をやわらかな甘みでまとめたバランスの良い味わいに仕上げました。グラスを近づけるだけで立ちのぼる香りと、なめらかな口当たり。クラフトビール初心者の方にもおすすめの1本です。

味わいと香りの特徴

−高知県産の柚子ピューレを贅沢に使用しています。−マンゴーやパッションフルーツを思わせる甘く華やかなトロピカルアロマに、柚子のキリッとした酸味とほろ苦い余韻が重なる、バランスの良い一杯です。−なめらかな口当たりと柚子の爽快感が心地よく、クラフトビール初心者の方でも楽しめる飲みやすさです。
私たちの想い

title: "Finish with your favorite vegetables" Vegan Ramen (4 servings)
content:
AFURI's proud vegan ramen is made from 100% vegetable ingredients.
Dried tomatoes, onions, carrots, celery, mushrooms, etc. are simmered in clear, soft water that is ideal for preparing soup, creating a bouillon-like soup that thoroughly brings out the flavor of the ingredients, and then seasoned with a salt sauce made from salt from Guérande in the southern part of Brittany, France, and seaweed salt from the Seto Inland Sea.
The noodles are made using high-quality wheat flour as well as lotus root flour, giving them a smooth texture.
Even though it does not contain any animal ingredients, it is still a ramen that is truly AFURI-like.
The only ingredients included are fried shallots and dried tomatoes (in the soup), so please top with your favorite vegetables. We recommend raw vegetables such as baby leaves and radishes, steamed vegetables such as broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots, and grilled vegetables such as zucchini and pumpkin. *The photo is for illustrative purposes only. Vegetable ingredients are not included in the product.
▼Contents・Homemade thin noodles with lotus root powder (approx. 130g) x 4 servings ・Vegan soup with dried tomatoes (approx. 340cc) x 4 servings・Fried shallots 10g x 2pc
▼Best before date: 180 days from date of manufacture if stored frozen (-18°C or below). (Please consume on the same day after thawing.)

▼How to save: Freeze required ▼ Wheat allergy ▼Nutritional information (per serving) Energy 503cal Protein 10.0g Fat 13.8g Carbohydrates 80.9g (Sugar 75.9, Dietary Fiber 5.0g) Salt equivalent: 2.8g

title: AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings) x 10 boxes Free shipping
content:
AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings per box) x 10 boxes
Click here for English explanation (Jump to English Description)
Addictive Yuzu and spicy flavor "Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles" Our staff's most popular dish! Now you can enjoy our Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles, which were previously only available in-store, at home. The fragrant yuzu and spicy red chili peppers combine to create a soup that will have you hooked at first bite!
A supreme bowl of ramen secretly recommended by AFURI staff The AFURI menu item "Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles" is actually very popular among the staff. The refreshing aroma of yuzu and the spiciness of chili peppers are a perfect match. Take a bite of the richly flavored soup and you'll discover a new taste. A special ramen only available at AFURI, loved by customers from overseas and savored to the last drop.
【noodles】 These extra-thin noodles are made from wheat flour, which has a strong elasticity and stickiness and is resistant to stretching when boiled, and two types of whole wheat flour with different particle sizes. These special dried noodles were created after numerous trials and have a unique blend that cannot be replicated anywhere else.
【soup】 - The aroma and stimulating flavor of this bean paste based dish will whet your appetite, and the addition of red chili peppers will give it a vibrant kick that will fill your mouth. The strong spiciness and rich flavor are so delicious that you'll be hooked once you try it.
-Multi-layered umami flavor of seafood stockBy exquisitely combining mackerel flakes, bonito flakes, grilled flying fish, kelp, etc., we have achieved a multi-layered and deep umami flavor.
The aroma and sourness of yuzu fills your mouth. The sourness of the yuzu juice gently envelops the spiciness, making this a cup that will have you reaching for the spoon.
[Seasonings] Made with finely cut domestic yuzu peel. Yuzu is one of the most important ingredients, so much so that it is said that "AFURI is synonymous with yuzu." We also paid particular attention to the grain size and the amount per cup.
▼Contents 304g (75g noodles x 2 servings)
▼Nutrition information per serving (152g) *Estimated calorie content: 442kcal Protein 15.2g Fat 14.6g Carbohydrates 62g Salt equivalent: 5.8g (noodles and toppings 0.5g / soup 5.3g)
▼Allergen information: Wheat, sesame, salmon, mackerel, soybeans, chicken, pork
▼Best before date At the time of ordering, we will deliver products with a best before date of at least two months. *We cannot accommodate requests for expiration dates when placing an order.
Storage method: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperatures and humidity and store at room temperature. Once opened, please consume as soon as possible regardless of the expiration date.
▼Size/Dimensions (2 servings per box) Height: Approx. 250mm Depth: Approx. 35 mm Width: approx. 85mm
▼How to make delicious ramen 1 Put plenty of water in a pot and heat it. Once it boils, add the noodles and boil until they reach your desired firmness. (You can loosen them with chopsticks halfway through the cooking process.) Hardening: 2 minutes / Basic: 2 minutes 30 seconds
2. Put the included soup into a bowl, add 270ml of boiling water and mix well.
3. Once the noodles are cooked, drain them using a colander, transfer to a bowl, and top with yuzu peel to serve.
★You can add char siu, boiled egg, mizuna, seaweed, etc. to your liking to make it even more delicious!
▼ Regarding shipping, the packaging size will vary depending on the number of items ordered. *This product cannot be purchased at the same time as Cool Takkyubin products.

AFURI Yuzu Ratanmen (2 servings per box) x 10 boxes

Yuzu × Spicy Chili – An Addictive Harmony Once available only in our restaurants, AFURI's beloved Yuzu Ratanmen can now be enjoyed at home. A perfect balance of refreshing Japanese yuzu and the bold heat of red chili creates a soup that captivates from the very first sip. This is one of our staff's top hidden favorites , and many overseas guests have also fallen in love with its unique taste.Noodles
Noodles Crafted with two types of whole wheat flour of different textures, these thin noodles have a firm bite and excellent resistance to overcooking. Specially developed through countless trials, they deliver a texture and flavor you won't find anywhere else.
Soup・Bold Spiciness & Depth A base of rich doubanjiang (chili bean paste) blended with red chili peppers for a powerful yet balanced heat. The robust umami makes this soup truly irresistible.
・Layered Umami from Seafood Dried mackerel, bonito flakes, roasted flying fish, and kelp are carefully combined to create a multi-dimensional, lingering umami.
・Bright Aroma of Yuzu Fresh yuzu juice softens the chili heat with a citrusy brightness, making each spoonful refreshing and addictive.
Toppings Finely cut domestic yuzu peel — one of AFURI's signature ingredients — adds a fragrant finishing touch. The peel's cut size and amount are carefully selected for each serving.
Contents 304g (75g noodles × 2 servings)
Nutritional Information (per serving: 152g, estimated)

Calories: 442kcal

Protein: 15.2g

Fat: 14.6g

Carbohydrates: 62g

Salt: 5.8g (Noodles & toppings: 0.5g / Soup: 5.3g)

Allergen Information Contains: wheat, sesame, salmon, mackerel, soy, chicken, pork
Expiration Date We guarantee at least 2 months before the expiration date at the time of your order. Please note we cannot accommodate requests for specific expiration dates.
Storage Instructions Store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight and high humidity. Please consume promptly after opening, regardless of the expiration date.
Dimensions (2 servings per box) Height: approx. 250mm Depth: approx. 35mm Width: approx. 85mm
Cooking Instructions

Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add the noodles, and cook to your desired firmness (loosen the noodles with chopsticks as they cook).

Firm: 2 minutes / Standard: 2 minutes 30 seconds

While the noodles are cooking, mix the included soup packet with 270ml of boiling water in a bowl.
Once the noodles are cooked, drain them and place them in the bowl with the soup. Garnish with the included yuzu peel and enjoy! Optional: Add chashu pork, boiled eggs, mizuna greens, or seaweed for an even richer experience!

title: Afuri Junmai Kimoto [Cannot be bundled]
content:
This sake was originally created to be served with ramen at AFURI's first US store in Portland. In America, the sauces used in all dishes, including sushi, tend to be on the stronger side, so this sake was developed to stand up to those dishes and enhance their flavors.
Of course, it also goes perfectly with ramen soup with its complex flavor. The sake is brewed by Kurosawa Sake Brewery, a long-established sake brewery in Nagano Prefecture with over 160 years of history.
[Taste] It is a medium-bodied sake with a rich and savory flavor. It does not overwhelm the delicious flavors and aromas of AFURI's ramen, which is made up of layers of chicken, fish, and vegetables, but rather brings them out to the fullest, with a pleasant acidity and a rich, lingering aftertaste. It also goes well with meat dishes, making it the perfect sake to drink not only with ramen, but also with roast pork as a snack.
[Manufacturing and Raw Materials] It is made using a traditional sake brewing method called "kimoto brewing," which is a very time-consuming and labor-intensive technique. The ingredients are rice (produced in Nagano Prefecture), rice malt, and water, making it a "junmai sake," but this "kimoto brewing" method gives it a deeper, full-bodied flavor and a more satisfying taste. It is a product of skillfully controlling the rice, microorganisms, and storage methods. The water used is pure, pumped well water.
* Delivery fee: 1,000 yen (including special box fee)
▼Item: Sake
▼Ingredients: Rice (domestic)・Rice malt (domestic rice)
▼Contents/Junmai Sake Contents 720ml・Alcohol content: 15% ・Rice polishing ratio: 65%
▼ Manufacturing date and date listed on product label
▼Other information: It usually takes 2-3 days from order to shipping.・This product will be sent by Yamato Transport (room temperature).・Returns/ExchangesIf there is a problem with the product, we will deal with it immediately. Please contact us by email or phone within 2 days of receiving the product.
*You must be 20 years old to drink alcohol. Please refrain from drinking alcohol during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.

title: Golden Spice
content:
AFURI's secret spice blend is a total of 12 types of spices. It looks like curry, but it's a little different.
The yuzu spicy red ramen and spicy red tsukemen will be transformed into a more profound flavor! Recommended recipes are being updated regularly! It can be used as a topping for ramen, of course, but also for a variety of other things such as gyoza, stir-fried vegetables, grilled meat, fried rice, and instant noodles. It can also be used as a spice in our popular hot pot products! Contains XXg for ample use.
Contents: 1 x Golden Spice XXg bag ~12 kinds of spices~・Coriander, cinnamon, green cardamom, cumin seeds, cloves, poppy seeds, licorice, turmeric, ginger, fenugreek, celery seeds, paprika powder
▼Expiration date If stored frozen (-18°C or below), it will last for 90 days from the date of manufacture. Please consume as soon as possible after opening.
As a rough guide, powdered spices last 1-2 years, and whole spices last 2-3 years. If you are buying a large amount at once, it may be a hassle, but buying whole spices and grinding them each time you use them will help the spices last longer than buying powdered spices.
1-2 After opening, use within 6 months

Spices come into contact with air immediately after opening, so their aroma and flavor will gradually deteriorate. Powdered spices in particular have a large surface area exposed to air, so they deteriorate very quickly. Also, be careful as some spices may harden depending on the type and shape. Therefore, it is recommended to use them up within about six months after opening.

Storage Method: Refrigerate (below 10°C) Use a desiccant or store in a resealable zippered bag or tightly sealed container in a cool, dark place.
▼Allergies

Enjoy the authentic taste of AFURI's famous ramen at home with a soup made from carefully selected ingredients and specially crafted noodles that deliver the perfect texture and flavor.
Whether as a treat for yourself or a gift for someone special, our “Souvenir Ramen” is the perfect choice.
Noodles These thin, delicate noodles are made from two types of whole wheat flour with different textures, giving them a firm, resilient bite and resistance to overcooking. Our special dry noodles have a unique blend that you won't find anywhere else, perfected through countless trials.
Soup With minimal use of artificial seasonings, the soup is made with premium ingredients such as chicken bones, aromatic vegetables, kombu, and dried fish, extracting the maximum potential from each component. Despite its golden clarity, this broth is rich and deeply flavorful thanks to the quality ingredients used.
Toppings We use finely cut yuzu peel from domestic sources. Yuzu is one of AFURI's signature ingredients, and we take great care in selecting the peel's texture and portion size for each serving.
Contents 290g (75g noodles × 2 servings)
Nutritional Information (per serving: 145g)

Calories: 454kcal
Protein: 15.2g
Fat: 13.5g
Carbohydrates: 60.1g
Salt: 6.1g (Noodles & toppings: 0.5g / Soup: 5.6g)

Allergen Information Contains wheat, sesame, salmon, mackerel, soy, chicken, pork.
Expiration Date We guarantee at least 2 months before the expiration date at the time of your order. Please note we cannot accommodate requests for specific expiration dates.

Cooking Instructions

Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add the noodles, and cook to your desired firmness (loosen the noodles with chopsticks as they cook).

Firm: 2 minutes / Standard: 2 minutes 30 seconds

While the noodles are cooking, mix the included soup packet with 270ml of boiling water in a bowl.
Once the noodles are cooked, drain them and place them in the bowl with the soup. Garnish with the included yuzu peel and enjoy! Optional: Add chashu pork, boiled eggs, mizuna greens, or seaweed for an even richer experience!

title: [Limited stock] "Sansho scented" vacuum hand-kneaded noodles 3 servings
content:
<"Sansho-scented" vacuum-kneaded noodles>
Our regular products are all 155g to 165g per ball, but these balls are slightly larger than that range (there are a mixture of slightly smaller and larger balls). The taste and quality are exactly the same.
Due to selection, the number of items we can list each day is limited, so please forgive us if they are sold out.
◯Below is the description of the regular product◯ AFURI's special "vacuum hand-kneaded noodles" are made by kneading two different types of domestic wheat with different characteristics, as well as durum flour, in a vacuum mixer and then kneading them by hand. This limited edition product is made by adding Japanese pepper and Japanese pepper to the vacuum hand-kneaded noodles, giving them a spicy and refreshing flavor.
It can be used as a replacement for ramen or tsukemen, and is also delicious with pasta and soba noodles.
▼Contents "Sansho Fragrant" Vacuum Hand-Kneaded Noodles (3 Servings)
▼How to eat・For ramenBoil in plenty of boiling water. The recommended boiling time is 2 minutes 30 seconds to 3 minutes.
・For tsukemen, boil them in plenty of water, just like ramen. The approximate boiling time is It takes 4 minutes 30 seconds to 5 minutes 30 seconds . Once boiled, drain in a colander and rinse thoroughly under running water to remove any slime. Depending on your preference, you can finish by rinsing in ice water to make the noodles firmer.
▼Best before date If stored frozen (below -18°C), the expiration date is 180 days from the date of manufacture. Once thawed, consume on the same day.
▼Storage method: Refrigeration required
▼ Wheat allergy *There is a rare possibility that small amounts of ingredients that are not originally used may be mixed in or come into contact with food during the cooking process or through cooking utensils.
▼Other information: It usually takes about 2-3 days from order to shipping.・This item will be sent via Yamato Transport's refrigerated delivery service. ・Returns/ExchangesIf there is a problem with the product, we will deal with it immediately. Please contact us by email or phone within 2 days of receiving the product.
AFURI's ramen contains no artificial seasonings, synthetic colorings or preservatives.

title: Spicy adjustment kit (with extra spicy bonus)
content:
This is a set of spicy items that are the source of the spiciness of Karakou Ramen. You can of course increase the spiciness of Karakou Ramen to your liking, but you can also use it to change other ramen/tsukemen to your own original spicy taste! There is a generous amount of each item, so if you have any left over, you can use it in your cooking at home!
・Spicy Red Powder This is a bright red powder made by blending several types of chili powder, Japanese pepper, ginger, etc. It dyes soups and sauces red and adds a spicy flavor and the unique umami taste of chili peppers.
・Yuzu spicy red sauce (Yuzu karakurenaijan) This is a special spicy miso made by Karakou. It is not just spicy, but also has sweetness, bitterness, umami from the miso and garlic, and the flavor of yuzu, all of which have been matured.
・Super spicy thick chili oil This is made by finely grinding the by-products (chili powder, fried onions, and garlic) that are produced when making super spicy chili oil and mixing them into chili oil. Please enjoy the rich aroma of burnt aromatic vegetables and the stimulating spiciness.
・Jolokia powder (bonus) This is a fine powder of the well-known super-hot chili pepper, Bhut Jolokia. A small amount is extremely hot, so it's great when you want to add some spiciness without changing the taste. *Please be careful when handling this product as it can be very dangerous if it gets into your eyes or nose.
Contents: 2 bags of 30g spicy red powder, 1 bag of 10g jolokia powder, 1 100g yuzu spicy red sauce, 2 bottles of 90g super spicy chili oil
▼Expiration date If stored frozen (-18°C or below), it will last for 90 days from the date of manufacture. The flavor of both products will gradually deteriorate, so please consume them as soon as possible.
Storage Method: Refrigerate (below 10°C)
▼Allergens: Yuzu spicy red soy sauce Wheat, pork, chicken, soybeans, salmon, mackerel
▼Other information: It usually takes about 2-3 days from order to shipping.・This item will be sent via Yamato Transport's refrigerated delivery service.・Returns/ExchangesIf there is a problem with the product, we will deal with it immediately. Please contact us by email or phone within 2 days of receiving the product.
AFURI's ramen and tsukemen contain no artificial seasonings, synthetic colorings, or preservatives.


Contents of the spiciness adjustment kit.
<How to use> Add an appropriate amount to your favorite ramen/tsukemen and enjoy. Add it to yuzu salt ramen... it becomes yuzu spicy salt ramen! If you pour it over the noodles of Yuzuro Tsukemen or add it to the sauce, it becomes Yuzu Spicy Tsukemen! Of course, you can also use it to increase the spiciness of Karakou Ramen and Kararo Tsukemen. The bonus "Jolokia Powder" is very spicy. When using, try it little by little. Also, be careful not to let it get in your eyes, nose, etc.

title: Golden Spice
content:
AFURI's secret spice blend is a total of 12 types of spices. It looks like curry, but it's a little different.
This will give the yuzu spicy red ramen and spicy red tsukemen an even deeper flavor! It can be used as a topping for ramen, as well as for a variety of other dishes such as gyoza, stir-fried vegetables, grilled meat, fried rice, and cup noodles.
It can also be used as a spice in our popular hot pot products! It comes in a generous 25g pack.
▼Contents Golden Spice 25g x 1 bottle ~12 kinds of spices~ Coriander, cinnamon, green cardamom, cumin seeds, cloves, poppy seeds, licorice, turmeric, ginger, fenugreek, celery seeds, paprika powder
▼ Best before date: Printed on product label
1 year from the date of manufacture Please consume as soon as possible after opening.
Storage method: Avoid high temperatures and humidity. Store at room temperature. After opening, store in a cool, dark place.
▼It usually takes 2-3 days from the time of order to shipping. This item will be sent by Yamato Transport's courier service.
▼Returns/Exchanges If there is a problem with the product, we will deal with it immediately. Please contact us by email or phone within 2 days of receiving the product.
AFURI's ramen and tsukemen are free of chemical seasonings, synthetic colorings, and preservatives.

Use it for a variety of dishes, including ramen, gyoza, grilled meat/steak, stir-fried vegetables, fried rice, instant noodles, hot pot, etc. The flavor of the spices enhances the deliciousness of the dish.
ingredients: This will give the yuzu spicy red ramen and spicy red tsukemen an even deeper flavor! It can be used as a topping for ramen, as well as for a variety of other dishes such as gyoza, stir-fried vegetables, grilled meat, fried rice, and cup noodles.

title: AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings) x 20 boxes Free shipping
content:
AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings per box) x 20 boxes
Click here for English explanation (Jump to English Description)
Addictive Yuzu and spicy flavor "Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles" Our staff's most popular dish! Now you can enjoy our Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles, which were previously only available in-store, at home. The fragrant yuzu and spicy red chili peppers combine to create a soup that will have you hooked at first bite!
A supreme bowl of ramen secretly recommended by AFURI staff The AFURI menu item "Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles" is actually very popular among the staff. The refreshing aroma of yuzu and the spiciness of chili peppers are a perfect match. Take a bite of the richly flavored soup and you'll discover a new taste. A special ramen only available at AFURI, loved by customers from overseas and savored to the last drop.
【noodles】 These extra-thin noodles are made from wheat flour, which has a strong elasticity and stickiness and is resistant to stretching when boiled, and two types of whole wheat flour with different particle sizes. These special dried noodles were created after numerous trials and have a unique blend that cannot be replicated anywhere else.
【soup】 - The aroma and stimulating flavor of this bean paste based dish will whet your appetite, and the addition of red chili peppers will give it a vibrant kick that will fill your mouth. The strong spiciness and rich flavor are so delicious that you'll be hooked once you try it.
-Multi-layered umami flavor of seafood stockBy exquisitely combining mackerel flakes, bonito flakes, grilled flying fish, kelp, etc., we have achieved a multi-layered and deep umami flavor.
The aroma and sourness of yuzu fills your mouth. The sourness of the yuzu juice gently envelops the spiciness, making this a cup that will have you reaching for the spoon.
[Seasonings] Made with finely cut domestic yuzu peel. Yuzu is one of the most important ingredients, so much so that it is said that "AFURI is synonymous with yuzu." We also paid particular attention to the grain size and the amount per cup.
▼Contents 304g (75g noodles x 2 servings)
▼Nutrition information per serving (152g) *Estimated calorie content: 442kcal Protein 15.2g Fat 14.6g Carbohydrates 62g Salt equivalent: 5.8g (noodles and toppings 0.5g / soup 5.3g)
▼Allergen information: Wheat, sesame, salmon, mackerel, soybeans, chicken, pork
▼Best before date At the time of ordering, we will deliver products with a best before date of at least two months. *We cannot accommodate requests for expiration dates when placing an order.
Storage method: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperatures and humidity and store at room temperature. Once opened, please consume as soon as possible regardless of the expiration date.
▼Size/Dimensions (2 servings per box) Height: Approx. 250mm Depth: Approx. 35 mm Width: approx. 85mm
▼How to make delicious ramen 1 Put plenty of water in a pot and heat it. Once it boils, add the noodles and boil until they reach your desired firmness. (You can loosen them with chopsticks halfway through the cooking process.) Hardening: 2 minutes / Basic: 2 minutes 30 seconds
2. Put the included soup into a bowl, add 270ml of boiling water and mix well.
3. Once the noodles are cooked, drain them using a colander, transfer to a bowl, and top with yuzu peel to serve.
★You can add char siu, boiled egg, mizuna, seaweed, etc. to your liking to make it even more delicious!
▼ Regarding shipping, the packaging size will vary depending on the number of items ordered. *This product cannot be purchased at the same time as Cool Takkyubin products.

AFURI Yuzu Ratanmen (2 servings per box) x 20 boxes


Yuzu × Spicy Chili – An Addictive Harmony Once available only in our restaurants, AFURI's beloved Yuzu Ratanmen can now be enjoyed at home. A perfect balance of refreshing Japanese yuzu and the bold heat of red chili creates a soup that captivates from the very first sip. This is one of our staff's top hidden favorites , and many overseas guests have also fallen in love with its unique taste.Noodles
Noodles Crafted with two types of whole wheat flour of different textures, these thin noodles have a firm bite and excellent resistance to overcooking. Specially developed through countless trials, they deliver a texture and flavor you won't find anywhere else.
Soup・Bold Spiciness & Depth A base of rich doubanjiang (chili bean paste) blended with red chili peppers for a powerful yet balanced heat. The robust umami makes this soup truly irresistible.
・Layered Umami from Seafood Dried mackerel, bonito flakes, roasted flying fish, and kelp are carefully combined to create a multi-dimensional, lingering umami.
・Bright Aroma of Yuzu Fresh yuzu juice softens the chili heat with a citrusy brightness, making each spoonful refreshing and addictive.
Toppings Finely cut domestic yuzu peel — one of AFURI's signature ingredients — adds a fragrant finishing touch. The peel's cut size and amount are carefully selected for each serving.
Contents 304g (75g noodles × 2 servings)
Nutritional Information (per serving: 152g, estimated)

Calories: 442kcal

Protein: 15.2g

Fat: 14.6g

Carbohydrates: 62g

Salt: 5.8g (Noodles & toppings: 0.5g / Soup: 5.3g)

Allergen Information Contains: wheat, sesame, salmon, mackerel, soy, chicken, pork
Expiration Date We guarantee at least 2 months before the expiration date at the time of your order. Please note we cannot accommodate requests for specific expiration dates.
Storage Instructions Store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight and high humidity. Please consume promptly after opening, regardless of the expiration date.
Dimensions (2 servings per box) Height: approx. 250mm Depth: approx. 35mm Width: approx. 85mm
Cooking Instructions

Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add the noodles, and cook to your desired firmness (loosen the noodles with chopsticks as they cook).

Firm: 2 minutes / Standard: 2 minutes 30 seconds

While the noodles are cooking, mix the included soup packet with 270ml of boiling water in a bowl.
Once the noodles are cooked, drain them and place them in the bowl with the soup. Garnish with the included yuzu peel and enjoy! Optional: Add chashu pork, boiled eggs, mizuna greens, or seaweed for an even richer experience!

Shipping Information The package size will vary depending on the number of items ordered. This product cannot be purchased alongside items shipped via refrigerated delivery.

The soup is made using carefully selected ingredients to faithfully reproduce the restaurant's flavor, and the special noodles are made with a focus on texture and flavor, so you can enjoy a restaurant-like taste in the comfort of your own home.

【noodles】 These extra-thin noodles are based on wheat flour, which has strong elasticity and stickiness and is resistant to stretching when boiled, and are made using two types of whole wheat flour with different particle sizes. This special dried noodle was created after repeated trial and error, with a unique blend that cannot be found anywhere else.
【soup】 We use no artificial seasonings and only carefully selected ingredients such as chicken bones, aromatic vegetables, kelp, and dried sardines to bring out the best in the ingredients. Enjoy the clear, golden soup with a deep flavor that is woven together from multiple layers of high-quality ingredients.
[Seasoning] Made with finely chopped domestic yuzu peel. Yuzu is one of AFURI's most important ingredients. We also paid special attention to the grain size and the amount per cup.

2. Put the soup provided into a bowl, add 270ml of boiling water, and mix well.

title: AFURI original charm
content:
AFURI original charm
Introducing new original charms featuring designs based on AFURI's popular menu items!
You'll have to open it to find out which of the four flavors you'll receive - "Yuzu Shio Ramen," "Yuzu Soy Sauce Ramen," "Yuzu Hot Soup Ramen," or "Yuzu Dew Tsukemen" - you'll have to wait until you open it to find out.

It adds a stylish touch to your everyday items and also serves as an easy-to-find marker!
No matter which design you receive, you're sure to be pleased with the finished product. It is recommended not only for AFURI fans and ramen lovers, but also as a small gift.
Enjoy the excitement of opening it!

title: Afuri IPA 350ml (24-bottle set) [Cannot be bundled with other items] Free shipping
content:
AFURI BREWING/Afuri IPA
Experience the fruity aroma! AFURI's first craft beer
A juicy and gorgeous fragrance reminiscent of mango, passion fruit, and grapefruit spreads. Afuri IPA is a hazy IPA style beer characterized by its mellow mouthfeel and light aftertaste. The DDH (double dry hop) method uses a generous amount of hops, so the aroma spreads softly just by bringing the glass close, making it easy to drink even for those new to craft beer.

Our thoughts

AFURI BREWING began with a pure and passionate desire to make beer. At the heart of this is the "craftsmanship" that has been passed down to AFURI Ramen. We are committed to handcrafting, honing individuality and pursuing the finest aromas and flavors. We also tried our hand at creating a hazy IPA style, with the desire to create a memorable aroma. Then, in Gora, Hakone, we designed the recipe from scratch and brewed it together with a trusted brewer. AFURI's first original craft beer. This is a memorable first step towards realizing our dream of brewing our own beer.
◼︎Product overview Product name: Afuri IPA Style: DDH HAZY IPA Alcohol content: 6.5% IBUs ( International Bitterness Units ): 12.5 Capacity: 350ml can / set of 24 Ingredients: Malt (imported), hops Production location: GORA BREWERY (Hakone, Kanagawa Prefecture) Storage method: Keep refrigerated. Best before date: Printed on the bottom of the can.
Other : It usually takes 2-3 days from order to shipping.・This item will be sent by Yamato Transport (refrigerated).
◼︎Regarding returns/exchanges If there is any problem with the product, we will deal with it immediately. Please contact us by email or phone within 2 days of receiving the product. Please note that even if you wish to exchange an item, we may not be able to accommodate your request depending on stock availability. In that case, we apologize for the inconvenience, but we will cancel your order (and refund your money).
*Free shipping
*You must be 20 years old to drink alcohol. Please refrain from drinking alcohol during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. *Prices include tax (10%).

title: AFURI Yuzu Shio Ramen (2 servings) [Cannot be bundled]
content:
AFURI Yuzu Shio Ramen (2 servings per box)
Click here for English explanation (Jump to English Description)
The soup is made using carefully selected ingredients to faithfully reproduce the restaurant's flavor, and the special noodles are made with a focus on texture and flavor, so you can enjoy a restaurant-like taste in the comfort of your own home.
Please try our "souvenir ramen", which is perfect as a treat for yourself or as a gift for a special person.
【noodles】 These extra-thin noodles are based on wheat flour, which has strong elasticity and stickiness and is resistant to stretching when boiled, and are made using two types of whole wheat flour with different particle sizes. This special dried noodle was created after repeated trial and error, with a unique blend that cannot be found anywhere else.
【soup】 We use no artificial seasonings and only carefully selected ingredients such as chicken bones, aromatic vegetables, kelp, and dried sardines to bring out the best in the ingredients. Enjoy the clear, golden soup with a deep flavor that is woven together from multiple layers of high-quality ingredients.
[Seasoning] Made with finely chopped domestic yuzu peel. Yuzu is one of AFURI's most important ingredients. We also paid special attention to the grain size and the amount per cup.
▼Contents 290g (2 servings of 75g noodles)
▼Nutritional information per serving (145g) *Estimated calorie content: 454kcal Protein 15.2g Fat 13.5g Carbohydrates 60.1g Salt equivalent: 6.1g (noodles and toppings 0.5g / soup 5.6g)
▼Allergen information: Wheat, sesame, salmon, mackerel, soybeans, chicken, pork
▼Best before date At the time of ordering, we will deliver products with a best before date of at least 2 months. *We cannot accommodate requests to specify an expiration date when placing an order.
▼Storage method: Store at room temperature away from direct sunlight, high temperatures and humidity. Once opened, please consume as soon as possible regardless of the expiration date.
▼Size/dimensions (2 meals per box) Height: Approx. 250mm Depth: Approx. 35mm Width: Approx. 85mm
▼How to make delicious ramen1Put plenty of water in a pot and put it on the fire. When it boils, add the noodles and boil them to your desired hardness. (You can loosen the noodles with chopsticks halfway through.) Hard: 2 minutes / Basic: 2 minutes 30 seconds
2. Put the soup provided into a bowl, add 270ml of boiling water, and mix well.
3. Once the noodles are cooked, drain them using a colander, transfer to a bowl, and top with yuzu peel to serve.
★You can add roasted pork, boiled egg, mizuna, seaweed, etc. to your liking to make it even more delicious!
▼ Regarding shipping, packaging size will vary depending on the number of items ordered. (It will be shipped by Yamato Transport Takkyubin or Compact.) Shipping costs are a flat rate of 1,000 yen ( free shipping for purchases of 7 or more ). *This product cannot be purchased at the same time as Cool Takkyubin products.

AFURI Yuzu Shio Ramen (2 servings per box)

Enjoy the authentic taste of AFURI's famous ramen at home with a soup made from carefully selected ingredients and specially crafted noodles that deliver the perfect texture and flavor.
Whether as a treat for yourself or a gift for someone special, our “Souvenir Ramen” is the perfect choice.
Noodles These thin, delicate noodles are made from two types of whole wheat flour with different textures, giving them a firm, resilient bite and resistance to overcooking. Our special dry noodles have a unique blend that you won't find anywhere else, perfected through countless trials.
Soup Without using artificial seasonings, we have carefully selected premium ingredients such as chicken bones, aromatic vegetables, kombu, and dried fish to maximize the natural power of each ingredient. Enjoy the rich and layered flavors of this golden, clear broth, crafted from the finest ingredients.
Toppings We use finely cut yuzu peel from domestic sources. Yuzu is one of AFURI's signature ingredients, and we take great care in selecting the peel's texture and portion size for each serving.

While the noodles are cooking, mix the included soup packet with 270ml of boiling water in a bowl.
Once the noodles are cooked, drain them and place them in the bowl with the soup. Garnish with the included yuzu peel and enjoy! Optional: Add chashu pork, boiled eggs, mizuna greens, or seaweed for an even richer experience!

title: AFURI Original Charm Complete Set
content:
AFURI Original Charm Complete Set
A special set of four original charms based on AFURI's popular menu items!
This is a must-have item for AFURI fans, as it allows you to get all three designs of "Yuzu Shio Ramen," "Yuzu Shoyu Ramen," "Yuzu Hot Soup Ramen," and "Yuzu Tsuyu Tsukemen" all at once.
Each charm features a design that expresses vibrant colors and delicate details, and is packed with the charm of AFURI. It comes with a convenient rubber ring that can be easily attached to the handle of an umbrella, water bottle, or bag. It adds a stylish touch to your everyday items and also serves as an easy-to-find marker!
The complete set not only gives you satisfaction as a collection, but also makes a very special gift. By collecting all the types, you can enjoy the world of AFURI even more deeply. It is recommended not only for AFURI fans and ramen lovers, but also as a small gift.

content:

title: AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings) x 120 boxes Free shipping
content:
AFURI Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles (2 servings per box) x 120 boxes
Click here for English explanation (Jump to English Description)
Addictive Yuzu and spicy flavor "Yuzu Hot Soup Noodles" Our staff's most popular dish! Now you can enjoy our Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles, which were previously only available in-store, at home. The fragrant yuzu and spicy red chili peppers combine to create a soup that will have you hooked at first bite!
A supreme bowl of ramen secretly recommended by AFURI staff The AFURI menu item "Yuzu Spicy Soup Noodles" is actually very popular among the staff. The refreshing aroma of yuzu and the spiciness of chili peppers are a perfect match. Take a bite of the richly flavored soup and you'll discover a new taste. A special ramen only available at AFURI, loved by customers from overseas and savored to the last drop.
【noodles】 These extra-thin noodles are made from wheat flour, which has a strong elasticity and stickiness and is resistant to stretching when boiled, and two types of whole wheat flour with different particle sizes. These special dried noodles were created after numerous trials and have a unique blend that cannot be replicated anywhere else.
【soup】 - The aroma and stimulating flavor of this bean paste based dish will whet your appetite, and the addition of red chili peppers will give it a vibrant kick that will fill your mouth. The strong spiciness and rich flavor are so delicious that you'll be hooked once you try it.
-Multi-layered umami flavor of seafood stockBy exquisitely combining mackerel flakes, bonito flakes, grilled flying fish, kelp, etc., we have achieved a multi-layered and deep umami flavor.
The aroma and sourness of yuzu fills your mouth. The sourness of the yuzu juice gently envelops the spiciness, making this a cup that will have you reaching for the spoon.
[Seasonings] Made with finely cut domestic yuzu peel. Yuzu is one of the most important ingredients, so much so that it is said that "AFURI is synonymous with yuzu." We also paid particular attention to the grain size and the amount per cup.
▼Contents 304g (75g noodles x 2 servings)
▼Nutrition information per serving (152g) *Estimated calorie content: 442kcal Protein 15.2g Fat 14.6g Carbohydrates 62g Salt equivalent: 5.8g (noodles and toppings 0.5g / soup 5.3g)
▼Allergen information: Wheat, sesame, salmon, mackerel, soybeans, chicken, pork
▼Best before date At the time of ordering, we will deliver products with a best before date of at least two months. *We cannot accommodate requests for expiration dates when placing an order.
Storage method: Avoid direct sunlight, high temperatures and humidity and store at room temperature. Once opened, please consume as soon as possible regardless of the expiration date.

▼How to make delicious ramen 1 Put plenty of water in a pot and heat it. Once it boils, add the noodles and boil until they reach your desired firmness. (You can loosen them with chopsticks halfway through the cooking process.) Hardening: 2 minutes / Basic: 2 minutes 30 seconds
2. Put the included soup into a bowl, add 270ml of boiling water and mix well.
3. Once the noodles are cooked, drain them using a colander, transfer to a bowl, and top with yuzu peel to serve.
★You can add char siu, boiled egg, mizuna, seaweed, etc. to your liking to make it even more delicious!
▼ Regarding shipping, the packaging size will vary depending on the number of items ordered. *This product cannot be purchased at the same time as Cool Takkyubin products.

AFURI Yuzu Ratanmen (2 servings per box) x 120 boxes

Yuzu × Spicy Chili – An Addictive Harmony Once available only in our restaurants, AFURI's beloved Yuzu Ratanmen can now be enjoyed at home. A perfect balance of refreshing Japanese yuzu and the bold heat of red chili creates a soup that captivates from the very first sip. This is one of our staff's top hidden favorites , and many overseas guests have also fallen in love with its unique taste.Noodles
Noodles Crafted with two types of whole wheat flour of different textures, these thin noodles have a firm bite and excellent resistance to overcooking. Specially developed through countless trials, they deliver a texture and flavor you won't find anywhere else.
Soup・Bold Spiciness & Depth A base of rich doubanjiang (chili bean paste) blended with red chili peppers for a powerful yet balanced heat. The robust umami makes this soup truly irresistible.
・Layered Umami from Seafood Dried mackerel, bonito flakes, roasted flying fish, and kelp are carefully combined to create a multi-dimensional, lingering umami.
・Bright Aroma of Yuzu Fresh yuzu juice softens the chili heat with a citrusy brightness, making each spoonful refreshing and addictive.
Toppings Finely cut domestic yuzu peel — one of AFURI's signature ingredients — adds a fragrant finishing touch. The peel's cut size and amount are carefully selected for each serving.
Contents 304g (75g noodles × 2 servings)
Nutritional Information (per serving: 152g, estimated)

Protein: 15.2g

Fat: 14.6g

Carbohydrates: 62g

Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add the noodles, and cook to your desired firmness (loosen the noodles with chopsticks as they cook).

Firm: 2 minutes / Standard: 2 minutes 30 seconds

While the noodles are cooking, mix the included soup packet with 270ml of boiling water in a bowl.
Once the noodles are cooked, drain them and place them in the bowl with the soup. Garnish with the included yuzu peel and enjoy! Optional: Add chashu pork, boiled eggs, mizuna greens, or seaweed for an even richer experience!

Expiration Date We guarantee at least 2 months before the expiration date at the time of your order. Please note we cannot accommodate requests for specific expiration dates.
Storage Instructions Store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight and high humidity. Please consume promptly after opening, regardless of the expiration date.
Dimensions (2 servings per box) Height: approx. 250mm Depth: approx. 35mm Width: approx. 85mm
Cooking Instructions

Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add the noodles, and cook to your desired firmness (loosen the noodles with chopsticks as they cook).

Firm: 2 minutes / Standard: 2 minutes 30 seconds

While the noodles are cooking, mix the included soup packet with 270ml of boiling water in a bowl.
Once the noodles are cooked, drain them and place them in the bowl with the soup. Garnish with the included yuzu peel and enjoy! Optional: Add chashu pork, boiled eggs, mizuna greens, or seaweed for an even richer experience!

Shipping Information The package size will vary depending on the number of items ordered. (We ship via Yamato courier or compact delivery.) A flat shipping fee of 1,000 yen applies (free shipping for orders of 7 or more boxes). This product cannot be purchased alongside items shipped via refrigerated delivery.

title: AFURI Original Half Ramen Bowl (White)
content:
The so-called white bowl is used only at AFURI's main store, ZUND-BAR, the original store, and some other stores. It is a ramen bowl with a different atmosphere from the blue bowls used at other AFURI stores. The white bowl makes the color of the soup stand out. The volume is just a little over half the size of the regular ramen bowls used in our stores, so it is a convenient size that can be used in a variety of situations, such as as a bowl for children or as a slightly larger rice bowl.
Each bowl is hand-painted by a craftsman, making it a one-of-a-kind bowl just for you. The outside features a traditional landscape pattern. The inside features a picture of Mt. Afuri, which is also the origin of the AFURI name. If you want to enjoy AFURI ramen at home, be sure to use this bowl!
Although it has a particular design, it is of professional quality, so it is a sturdy and very long-lasting bowl.
Mino ware (porcelain, microwave safe, not open flame safe)
*These are the same bowls used in stores.
★Please check before ordering★ Since all products are handmade by artisans, each product has its own unique look and feel, such as the color of the glaze and firing conditions. Please understand this in advance and enjoy the unique flavor of handmade products.
